oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Three Confederate soldiers from Mississippi
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Reprint of a daguerreotype of two enlisted soldiers and officer, Nicholas Blackwell. All wear tri-corner hats w/ 5-pointed stars, distinctive to Mississippi troops. James Blackwell was an ensign and flag bearer for Co. K, 21st Miss. Inf. Regt. Nicholas was a captain and doctor. Courtesy of the Bartlett Historical Society.
